subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Forward Petr Prucha's power-play goal put the Rangers in a tie for a playoff spot.  But the game was marred by Islander Chris Simon's attack on Ryan Hollweg with his stick.
snippet: Forward Petr Prucha's power-play goal put the Rangers in a tie for a playoff spot.  But the game was marred by Islander Chris Simon's attack on Ryan Hollweg with his stick.
